post.author: 이진경
post.content:
We are looking for a Junior/Intermediate XML Developer for a 3-4 month contract. The technical environment includes Java/J2EE, Weblogic, Oracle 8i and XML.

Requirements:
- 3-5 years experience in the IT industry.
- proven XML experience
- experience in the financial industry preferred.
- Computer Science degree an asset

If you have the above experience please forward your information to Jonathan at jw@etalentgroup.com
Additional Information
Salary: CAD 30.00 to CAD 45.00 per hour
Position Type: Full Time, Temporary/Contract/Project, Employee  

Contact Information
Jonathan Ward
jw@etalentgroup.com
eTalent Group
post.title: Junior/Intermediate XML Developer
